email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 250m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and the demurrage rate at $20,000 per day. Also, could you send over the full vessel details for our records? Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The laycan is 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details for the MV Ocean Star. Please review and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the booking at $50.00 per metric ton. Please send over the contract for signature. Thanks for your assistance. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll send over the contract shortly. Thanks for your business and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah.
